projects.description: Development of a web application for the management of personnel access to the company KCV, it controls the access of personnel and employees, implements a QR code to different areas of the plant.

projects.name: Russian Academy
projects.description: Web application that provides information on universities in Russia, adjusting prices and course schedules.
